description: Verified ASL signs with MediaPipe landmark keyframes

HELLO.description: Open hand moves from forehead outward like a salute

THANK-YOU.description: Flat hand touches chin and moves forward
THANK-YOU.notes: Tips of fingers touch chin then arc forward

YES.description: Fist nods up and down like a head nodding
YES.notes: Wrist bends to make fist nod

NO.description: Index and middle finger snap closed on thumb
NO.notes: Quick snap of fingers to thumb, often with head shake

I-LOVE-YOU.notes: Pinky, index, and thumb extended (I + L + Y combined)

GOOD.description: Flat hand from chin moves down to palm of other hand
GOOD.notes: Right hand lands on left palm

BAD.description: Flat hand from chin flips down
BAD.notes: Hand flips from palm-in at chin to palm-down

HELP.description: Fist on flat palm, both move up
HELP.notes: Thumbs-up fist rests on flat palm, both rise together

SORRY.notes: Circular motion with A-hand on chest

WHAT.description: Open hands shake side to side, palms up

WHERE.description: Index finger wags side to side

HOW.description: Knuckles together, palms down, twist to palms up
HOW.notes: Twist wrists outward, end palms up

WANT.description: Open claw hands pull toward body

NEED.notes: Wrist bends to make X-hand nod

UNDERSTAND.description: Index finger flicks up near forehead
UNDERSTAND.notes: Index finger springs up like a lightbulb moment

LEARN.description: Grab info from palm and put to forehead
LEARN.notes: Pick up from palm, bring to forehead

TEACH.description: Both flat-O hands move forward from temples
TEACH.notes: Hands move outward from temples, sharing knowledge

handshapes.U: Index and middle extended (like peace sign)
